lru-type.name: FEMC
lru-type.description: Control and monitor the front end embedded controller.

assembly-type.name: FEMC
assembly-type.description: Control and monitor the front end embedded controller.

baci-property.description: Returns the version information for the AMBSI1 firmware

monitor-point.description: Returns the version information for the AMBSI1 firmware

baci-property.description: This monitor point will cause the AMBSI1 to check for if the connection is ready and then to perform a series of communications with the ARCOM board to query the following information: - Lowest and highest RCAs of the special monitor functions - Lowest and highest RCAs of the special control functions - Lowest and highest RCAs of the monitor functions - Lowest and highest RCAs of the control functions After performing these queries, the AMBSI1 will try to register the monitor and control functions associated with the RCAs. This monitor request has to be issued before any other monitor or control request otherwise there will be no function register a part form the intrinsic AMBSI1 RCAs starting at 0x30000.

monitor-point.description: This monitor point will cause the AMBSI1 to check for if the connection is ready and then to perform a series of communications with the ARCOM board to query the following information: - Lowest and highest RCAs of the special monitor functions - Lowest and highest RCAs of the special control functions - Lowest and highest RCAs of the monitor functions - Lowest and highest RCAs of the control functions After performing these queries, the AMBSI1 will try to register the monitor and control functions associated with the RCAs. This monitor request has to be issued before any other monitor or control request otherwise there will be no function register a part form the intrinsic AMBSI1 RCAs starting at 0x30000.

baci-property.description: Returns the version information for the ARCOM Pegasus firmware

monitor-point.description: Returns the version information for the ARCOM Pegasus firmware

baci-property.description: Returns the RCA range for the special monitor points

monitor-point.description: Returns the RCA range for the special monitor points

baci-property.description: Returns the RCA range for the special control points

monitor-point.description: Returns the RCA range for the special control points

baci-property.description: Returns the RCA range for the monitor points

monitor-point.description: Returns the RCA range for the monitor points

baci-property.description: Returns the RCA range for the control points

monitor-point.description: Returns the RCA range for the control points

baci-property.description: Intended for debug purposes only, this message doesn't perform any operation. When called it will fill up a message payload with 8 0xFF and return. This will give an estimate on the longest time necessary to acknowledge and respond to the largest monitor request without performing any operation: it is a measure of the longest communication time between the ARCOM and the AMBSI1 board.

monitor-point.description: Intended for debug purposes only, this message doesn't perform any operation. When called it will fill up a message payload with 8 0xFF and return. This will give an estimate on the longest time necessary to acknowledge and respond to the largest monitor request without performing any operation: it is a measure of the longest communication time between the ARCOM and the AMBSI1 board.

baci-property.description: Returns information about the revision level of the FPGA code.

monitor-point.description: Returns information about the revision level of the FPGA code.

baci-property.description: Returns the current state of the FEMC console. The console is enabled by default at startup. This allows for debug operation. When enable the console adds about 50us to CAN comunication time.

monitor-point.description: Returns the current state of the FEMC console. The console is enabled by default at startup. This allows for debug operation. When enable the console adds about 50us to CAN comunication time.

baci-property.description: Return the number of Electronic Serial Numbers found in the syste,. There should be always at least 1 ESN if the system is working properly.

monitor-point.description: Return the number of Electronic Serial Numbers found in the syste,. There should be always at least 1 ESN if the system is working properly.

baci-property.description: Return list of electronic serial number found. If no ESN is found or there are issues with the bus, this monitor point will return 1 byte error. This is monitoring a cyclic buffer that stores the found ESNs. At index 0 (either the first time is monitored or the first monitor after the all 0s end off buffer message is returned) is the ESN for the FEMC. Once all the ESNs have been returned, a following monitor operation will return all 0 and the cycle will start again. If no devices were found an error will be returned.

monitor-point.description: Return list of electronic serial number found. If no ESN is found or there are issues with the bus, this monitor point will return 1 byte error. This is monitoring a cyclic buffer that stores the found ESNs. At index 0 (either the first time is monitored or the first monitor after the all 0s end off buffer message is returned) is the ESN for the FEMC. Once all the ESNs have been returned, a following monitor operation will return all 0 and the cycle will start again. If no devices were found an error will be returned.

baci-property.description: Generic Monitor Point. Serial number of the device.

monitor-point.description: Generic Monitor Point. Serial number of the device.

baci-property.description: Generic Monitor Point. Protocol revision level.

monitor-point.description: Generic Monitor Point. Protocol revision level.

baci-property.description: Generic Monitor Point. CAN-bus errors since power up and error code of the last error.

monitor-point.description: Generic Monitor Point. CAN-bus errors since power up and error code of the last error.

baci-property.description: Number of CAN errors since last power up or last reset.

monitor-point.description: Number of CAN errors since last power up or last reset.

baci-property.description: Internal slave error code

monitor-point.description: Internal slave error code

baci-property.description: Error code of last CAN error. Codes are those defined by the INTEL 82527 CAN Controller status.

monitor-point.description: Error code of last CAN error. Codes are those defined by the INTEL 82527 CAN Controller status.

baci-property.description: Generic Monitor Point. Number of transactions handled by the slave node since power up.

monitor-point.description: Generic Monitor Point. Number of transactions handled by the slave node since power up.

baci-property.description: Generic Monitor Point. Revision level of the embedded code. This is the software embedded in the AMBSI or the programmable device that is handling the AMB communications.

monitor-point.description: Generic Monitor Point. Revision level of the embedded code. This is the software embedded in the AMBSI or the programmable device that is handling the AMB communications.

baci-property.description: Generic Monitor Point. Temperature measured by the DS1820 chip.

monitor-point.description: Generic Monitor Point. Temperature measured by the DS1820 chip.
